donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The proposed project seeks to contribute to strengthening the rule of law, human rights protection and administration of justice by rolling out targeted capacity building interventions in five key areas: i) establishing a GBV prosecutorial unit at the MoJ to preside over the prosecution of SGBV and a roving prosecutor to ensure access to justice in needy areas; ii) providing institutional support to the TRC, the INCHR, and enhancing a human rights awareness at all levels iii) strengthening the judiciary with an information system  comprising a website, court facilities database and a rule of law resource center;  iv) mainstreaming gender issues in policy and programming; and iv) supporting the modernizing process of the national legislature through finalization and launch of the Strategic Plan and support to urgent institutional capacity building needs,

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: MPFT contribution to support the Rule of Law project

project_title: Strengthening Rule of Law & Adm of Justice AWP
